name: Pro Wrestling X
description: Pro wrestling video games lost their classic style of fun over a decade ago, and we're bringing it back with Pro Wrestling X. This lean-and-mean, no-frills Early Access debut is made BY wrestling fans, FOR wrestling fans.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 2 GHz Intel Dual Core Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800/ATI Radeon HD 2600 (256MB minimum) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3/Vista/Windows 7 or 8 Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Quad Core Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX460/ATI Radeon HD 5850 (512MB minimum) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
